price: Mmaa a wͻhwε wͻn ani so yie (anaasε wͻfεre adeε) a onipa (biara) anaasε Jinn mfaa wͻn ho nkaa wͻn da wͻ ne mmienu mu.
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
